holy shit i cant stop looking.........................
She has beautiful eyes.
double rainbow intensifies
love this post as it includes 3 of the 5 viable champs in this mode
It's so easy to dodge, i still wonder how people keep dying to it.
The times I died to it was because I was playing slow champions and couldn't walk out of range fast enough.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5R2qNEEH,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-07-16T05:33:06.030+0000)
>
> It's so easy to dodge, i still wonder how people keep dying to it.

Simple you root/stun you opponent right when you get the warning. Is really easy to score a triple with it as Syndra.
Didn't die myself yet, but I can see how people can die if they get cc'ed. There's that siege weapon that slows too.
I don't think some people know how much damage it does. I remember my lane opponent just kind of stood in it and kept pushing like it wasn't there.
I once pulled someone into it as Darius
It's usually used for zoning, though I died to it pretty lots of times at the start, but that's just because I'm an idiot.

I'm finding nexus sige very laggy. I don't know if it's my computer or the mode, but after we won I ended up staring at the victory screen for about 5 minutes before it took me into the post-game lobby.
My computer normally handles league fine but I am getting occasionally frame rate drops to like 2 fps at times, the mode is too flashy I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5R2qNEEH,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-16T01:02:32.207+0000)
>
> I'm finding nexus sige very laggy. I don't know if it's my computer or the mode, but after we won I ended up staring at the victory screen for about 5 minutes before it took me into the post-game lobby.

It's the mode. I literally cannot play it, my fps frequently drops to 2.
Good, thought it was just me

> [{quoted}](name=PeanutButterFan,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5R2qNEEH,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-07-16T01:30:26.299+0000)
>
> It's the mode. I literally cannot play it, my fps frequently drops to 2.

Same, I can barely move, let alone view the map. Literally < 5 fps the entire, grueling 40 minutes.

good to know. My computer has started to show signs of dying on me in the next few months so I really wasn't sure which it was. My computer isn't in a state where it would be causing major lag (if any), but you never know.
It was only a matter of time until this came to exist. So thank you for bringing it to fruition!
